verses.roman:
śuna, gaurahari, ei praśnera kāraṇa
nibhṛta hao yadi, tabe kari nivedana

synonyms: śuna—kindly hear; gaurahari—O Gaurahari; ei praśnera—of this question; kāraṇa—reason; nibhṛta—solitary; hao—You become; yadi—if; tabe—then; kari—I shall make; nivedana—submission.
translation: "Kindly listen, O Gaurahari! If You come to a private place, I shall then explain the reason."
